attributes.action: Force the oil compaines to take financial responsibilty for reversing the environmental impact caused by their products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's quite simple really. They produce a product that has a massive carbon footprint. They should be made to premptively plant enough trees to offset each barrel of oil they produce. The cost of oil should not be allowed to rise as a result of this since they should have been doing this from day one.
